titleStmt.title: These spirituall verses of Iames Hunt, concerning the down-fall of the ceremonies. VVhereby the bishops and their clergie have made, as it were, a trade to blinde and deceive the children of God, whom Christ Jesus hath redeemed from the bondage of Hell and corruption, by his suffering upon the crosse, and the power of his resurrection.
titleStmt.author: Hunt, James, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
